summary: This bill, H.R. 5321, amends U.S. Code Title 23 regarding high-occupancy vehicle (HOV) facilities. It extends the deadline for a special rule by over a year, from September 30, 2025, to December 31, 2026.  Furthermore, it mandates the Secretary of Transportation to submit a report to Congress within 180 days of the bill's enactment, detailing the effectiveness of electric vehicle exemptions in alleviating traffic congestion.
